content.2: In that day sing ye unto her, A vineyard of red wine.
content.5: Or let him take hold of my strength,
content.6: He shall cause them that come of Jacob to take root: Israel shall blossom and bud, and fill the face of the world with fruit.
content.7: Hath he smitten him, as he smote those that smote him?
content.8: In measure, when it shooteth forth, thou wilt debate with it: he stayeth his rough wind in the day of the east wind.
content.9: By this therefore shall the iniquity of Jacob be purged; and this
